title: Babe
creator_credit: Doug Mitchell, George Miller, Bill Miller, Roger Ford, Chris Noonan, Kennedy Miller Productions and Universal Pictures
headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1995
brief_description: Babe is a little pig who doesn’t quite know his place in the world. With a bunch of odd friends, Babe realises that he has the makings to become the greatest sheep pig of all time.

constellations_other.name: George Miller
constellations_other.description: For a guy who started his career as a physician, George Miller sure is a diverse filmmaker.

creator_credit_for_label: Doug Mitchell, George Miller, Bill Miller, Roger Ford, Chris Noonan, Kennedy Miller Productions and Universal Pictures
description: Babe is a little pig who doesn’t quite know his place in the world. With a bunch of odd friends, like Ferdinand the duck who thinks he is a rooster and Fly the dog he calls mum, Babe realises that he has the makings to become the greatest sheep pig of all time, and Farmer Hogget knows it. With the help of the sheep dogs, Babe learns that a pig can be anything that he wants to be.
description_for_label: Babe is a little pig who doesn’t quite know his place in the world. With a bunch of odd friends, like Ferdinand the duck who thinks he is a rooster and Fly the dog he calls mum, Babe realises that he has the makings to become the greatest sheep pig of all time, and Farmer Hogget knows it. With the help of the sheep dogs, Babe learns that a pig can be anything that he wants to be.
